item.title: Building the PELANGI App: A Leap Towards a Smarter Ngasem
item.description: Overview [IMAGE] PELANGI, short for Pelayanan Ngasem Terintegrasi, is a digital platform designed to deliver a seamless experience for the people of Ngasem. Launched in 2023, this app is all about making access easier and providing smart solutions to meet the diverse needs and demands of the community. “PELANGI is designed to enhance the quality of life for Ngasem residents and strengthen the bond between the government and its citizens through the power of digital technology.
